title: Gayatri Ladies Tailor — Gujarati-only multi-page business website with AI illustration placeholders

requirements.summary: Create a responsive SPA with exactly four pages (Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us) and active navigation highlighting.
acceptanceCriteria: Site provides navigation to exactly these four pages: Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile screens.
Navigation highlights the current page and works without page reload issues (SPA routing).

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with SPA routing for exactly four routes (Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us) and a shared layout wrapper.
Create a shared page layout (header/nav + main container + footer) optimized for mobile readability and consistent spacing.
Create the top navigation using React Router link components with active-state highlighting for the current page.
Create the Home page view and wire it into the router (no additional pages beyond the required four).
Create the About Us page view and wire it into the router.
Create the Services page view and wire it into the router.
Create the Contact Us page view and wire it into the router.
Update app bootstrap to render the new App component routing cleanly (SPA) and remove unused authentication provider wrappers since authentication is a non-goal.

requirements.summary: Ensure Gujarati-only UI copy and apply a Gujarati font globally across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: All visible text in the UI is Gujarati (no English labels/buttons).
A Gujarati font is applied globally (e.g., via CSS/Tailwind) so Gujarati glyphs render consistently.

file_operations.description: Set the document language to Gujarati and include a Gujarati-capable webfont (e.g., via a font link) so typography is consistent across devices.
Create global styles to apply Gujarati font and enforce Gujarati-first typography defaults across the entire site.
Extend Tailwind theme to define a Gujarati font family token and ensure it is used consistently via global styles and/or layout classes.
Centralize Gujarati-only UI strings (nav labels, headings, descriptions, CTA text) to avoid accidental English text in components.

requirements.summary: Implement strict design rules: light cream/white background, black body text, and dark red prominent shop name styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Default body/background is white or light cream across pages.
Body text is black by default (no gray body text).
The shop name is prominently styled in dark red with noticeably larger typography than other headings.

file_operations.description: Define global background and text defaults (light cream/white background and black body text) and set a dark red accent token for consistent use across pages.
Create a reusable brand header element that renders the shop name “Gayatri Ladies Tailor” with large, elegant, dark red styling and uses it in the layout/hero.
Apply the strict background/text defaults and include the brand header placement so the design rules remain consistent across all pages.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page hero with shop name, illustration placeholder, Gujarati description, working hours, and a tap-friendly Call Now button (tel:7359316413).
acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows the working time in Gujarati and clearly formatted.
Call Now button uses a tel: link pointing to 7359316413 and is easy to tap on mobile.
Hero uses an illustration image (not a human model photo) and the image section is labeled as replaceable.

file_operations.description: Implement the Home hero section with: dark-red shop name, Gujarati description, working hours (7:00 AM–9:00 PM), and a prominent tel: link button to 7359316413. Use the shadcn-ui Button component (if present) for a consistent tap target; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable image block component that renders a static illustration and includes a small Gujarati 'replaceable' label to meet the placeholder/replaceable requirement across pages.
Add the required hero illustration asset as a static file to be rendered on the Home page hero.

requirements.summary: Build the About Us page with Gujarati-only business details and a replaceable tailoring tools illustration/icon placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: About page content is Gujarati-only and reflects owner name and work-from-home tailoring service.
Page includes a non-photo illustration/icon and the section is marked as replaceable.

file_operations.description: Implement Gujarati-only About Us copy reflecting: Owner: Patel Geetaben J.; Work From Home; Ladies tailoring. Render a non-photo tools illustration via ReplaceableImage with a Gujarati replaceable label.
Add the required tailoring tools illustration asset as a static file for the About Us page.

requirements.summary: Build the Services page listing exactly six services in Gujarati, each with a non-photo icon/illustration in a mobile-friendly layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Services list includes exactly the six services provided, in Gujarati.
Each service has a simple icon/illustration; no real photos are used.
Services layout is mobile-friendly (e.g., 1-column on mobile, optional grid on larger screens).

file_operations.description: Render exactly six Gujarati service items in a responsive list/grid. Use a consistent card style (e.g., shadcn-ui Card if present) and show a minimal icon illustration per service; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable service card/row component that displays the Gujarati service name plus an icon illustration and a Gujarati replaceable label for the image block.
Add the required static service icon asset for needle and thread.
Add the required static service icon asset for blouse.
Add the required static service icon asset for fancy blouse.
Add the required static service icon asset for chaniya choli/navratri outfit.
Add the required static service icon asset for dress design/sketch.
Add the required static service icon asset for western dress/hanger.
Add the required static service icon asset for custom stitching/tape measure.

requirements.summary: Build the Contact Us page with clickable phone number, working hours, Gujarati CTA, and a replaceable phone/message illustration placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays phone number and working hours clearly in Gujarati.
Phone number is clickable (tel: link).
Contact illustration is non-photographic and marked as replaceable.

file_operations.description: Implement Gujarati-only contact content including working hours (7:00 AM–9:00 PM), a tel: link for 7359316413, and a simple Gujarati CTA. Include a non-photo contact illustration via ReplaceableImage with a Gujarati replaceable label.
Add the required static contact phone icon asset for the Contact Us page.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent minimal local-business theme (spacing, card style, icon style, typography scale) within the strict color rules across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent layout structure (header/nav, content width, section spacing).
Only dark red is used as a primary accent color; backgrounds remain white/light cream; body text remains black.
Overall look is minimal and trustworthy (no busy patterns, no heavy gradients).

file_operations.description: Standardize page structure (container width, section spacing, header/footer rhythm) so all pages feel cohesive and minimal.
Style navigation states (default/active) to match the theme and strict color rules (black text, dark red accent for active/hover).
Define shared typography scale, spacing conventions, and card/icon presentation helpers while keeping background light and body text black.

requirements.summary: Enforce illustration-only (no real human photos) and label every image area as replaceable in Gujarati.
acceptanceCriteria: No real-photo human imagery appears anywhere in the site.
Every illustration/image area includes a small Gujarati label indicating it is replaceable.
All imagery style is minimal and professional (consistent icon/illustration style).

file_operations.description: Ensure the component always renders the Gujarati replaceable label and provides consistent sizing/cropping so all illustrations look cohesive.
Use ReplaceableImage for the hero illustration and ensure no photo-based imagery is introduced.
Use ReplaceableImage for the About illustration and ensure the Gujarati replaceable label is visible.
Use ReplaceableImage (directly or via ServiceCard) for every service icon and ensure all service imagery is illustration-only.
Use ReplaceableImage for the contact illustration and ensure the Gujarati replaceable label is visible.

requirements.summary: Add required generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the relevant UI sections with Gujarati alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Pages reference these images via static paths (no backend image serving).
Images load correctly in the browser and have appropriate alt text (Gujarati).

file_operations.description: Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-sewing-illustration.dim_1400x800.png as a static asset with Gujarati alt text and show a Gujarati replaceable label.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/about-tailoring-tools.dim_800x600.png as a static asset with Gujarati alt text and show a Gujarati replaceable label.

Reference the service icons as static assets with Gujarati alt text: frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-needle-thread.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-blouse.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-fancy-blouse.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-chaniya-choli.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-dress-design.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-western-dress.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icon-custom-stitching.dim_256x256.png.
Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/contact-phone-icon.dim_256x256.png as a static asset with Gujarati alt text and show a Gujarati replaceable label.
